---
format: html 
---

::: {=html}
<style>
body {
  background-color: #040113ff;
}
a, a:link, a:visited {
  color: white;
}
a:hover, a:active {
  color: #EEEEEE;
}
#bg-video {
  position: absolute;        /* or fixed if you truly want it behind everything */
  top: 0; left: 0;
  width: 100%;               /* fill the container’s width */
  height: 100%;              /* keep its aspect ratio */
  object-fit: cover;       /* don’t crop or zoom—show the full frame */
  z-index: -1;
}

  .presentations-list {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    text-align: center;
  }
  .presentations-list a {
    display: block;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    white-space: nowrap;
    max-width: 90vw;
  }
</style>
:::
<video
  id="bg-video"
  autoplay
  muted
  loop
  playsinline
  preload="metadata"
  poster="scholar_poster.avif"
  style="position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;z-index:-1;opacity:0;transition:opacity .35s ease"
>
  <!-- Mobile first -->
  <source src="scholar_mobile.webm" type="video/webm" media="(max-width: 600px)" />
  <source src="scholar_mobile.mp4"  type="video/mp4"  media="(max-width: 600px)" />
  <!-- Desktop / fallback -->
  <source src="scholar.webm" type="video/webm" />
  <source src="scholar.mp4"  type="video/mp4" />
</video>

<script>
  (function(){
    const v = document.getElementById('bg-video');
    v.addEventListener('loadeddata', () => { v.style.opacity = 1; }, { once: true });
    setTimeout(() => { if (!v.style.opacity || v.style.opacity === '0') v.style.opacity = 1; }, 1000);
  })();
</script>

<div class="presentations-list">
  <a href="/Presentations/mmdis/">Measuring and Mitigating Disparity of Decision-Making Tools</a><br>
  <a href="/Presentations/seir-n-mixture/">SEIR N-mixture Model</a>
</div>
